nb.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Din autorisasjonskode er ugyldig.

Vennligst sørg for å kopiere og lime inn hele URL-en som vi har sendt deg på mail.
nb.auth.forgot.email_help: Skriv inn e-postadressen tilknyttet til din konto så sender vi brukerinformasjonen din til deg på mail.
nb.auth.forgot.heading: Få tilsendt brukerinformasjonen din
nb.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Hmm, den e-postadressen er ikke i vårt system. Kanskje du ikke har registrert deg enda?
nb.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Vi har sendt brukerinformasjonen din til e-postadressen du har angitt.
nb.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Før du kan logge inn til Game Jolt må du bekrefte e-postadressen din.

Vi har sendt deg en e-post med instruksjoner om hvordan du autoriserer kontoen din.
nb.You found a secret! But upon further ins: You found a secret! But on further inspection, you realize it's just an empty page.
Nei takk, la meg laste ned.
nb.Check your Internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.

nb.This allows you to disable right mouse c:
Dette tillater deg å skru av høyremuseklikk.
Bruk kun dette hvis spillet ditt trenger å fange opp høyreklikk.

nb.This helps us create better filtering op: Dette hjelper oss med å lage bedre filtreringsvalg rundt hvilke verktøy folk bruker.
nb.References to or images of alcoholic bev: Referanser til eller bilder av alkoholholdig drikke.

Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.

nb.Mild depictions of realistic characters: Mild depictions of realistic characters in unsafe situations.

nb.Graphic depictions of violence involving: Graphic depictions of violence involving realistic characters.

nb.You've published your game to the site!: You've published your game to the site! Huzzah! Remember to spread the word...

nb.Are you sure you want to publish this re: Are you sure you want to publish this release? All of its builds will become active on your game page.
nb.The release is now active on your game p: The release is now active on your game page.
nb.Are you sure you want to remove this rel: Are you sure you want to remove this release? All of its builds will be removed as well.
nb.The release and its builds have been rem: The release and its builds have been removed from the package.
nb.Are you sure you want to hide this relea: Are you sure you want to hide this release? It will no longer be accessible from your game page.
nb.The release has been unpublished and is: The release has been unpublished and is now hidden.
nb.Are you sure you want to permanently rem: Are you sure you want to permanently remove your game?
nb.Your game has been removed from the site: Your game has been removed from the site. Maybe a phoenix will rise in its place one day.
